name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Senior Backend Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing robust software solutions, focusing on back-end technologies and cloud-native applications. Proficient in **Python**, **Django**, **Flask**, **FastAPI**, and skilled in relational databases such as **PostgreSQL** and SQL. Expert in designing APIs, managing data migrations, and implementing schema design. Adept in **CI/CD** practices to ensure seamless integration and deployment of applications. Experienced in applying industry standards for secure and compliant solutions. Strong communication skills facilitate collaboration with cross-functional teams, enhancing project outcomes. Proven track record of leveraging modern frameworks and cloud services, including **AWS**, to create maintainable and efficient back-end systems.
